message: How difficult would it be to create an Arduino shield that can take a SIM and have a radio on it to make and receive calls?  Would you call it SIMduino?  PhoneDuino?  I like the idea of being able to call or text an Arduino and make it do stuff.
Check out the message in a bottle redbull creation entry.  They have SMS
Looks like Android is going to interface with Arduino: http://blog.makezine.com/archive/2011/05/why-google-choosing-arduino-matters-and-the-end-of-made-for-ipod-tm.html
